original_text: So they took him out of the chariot that he was riding in. They put him in his other chariot. Then they took him to Jerusalem and he died there. His people buried him beside his ancestors. All the people of Judah and Jerusalem wept because Josiah had died.
korean_text: 그 부하들이 그를 병거에서 내리게 하고 그의 버금 병거에 태워 예루살렘에 이른 후에 그가 죽으니 그의 조상들의 묘실에 장사되니라 온 유다와 예루살렘 사람들이 요시야를 슬퍼하고

sentences.original_text: So they took him out of the chariot
They put him in his other chariot
Then they took him to Jerusalem
His people buried him beside his ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 백성들은 그를 조상들 곁에 묻었습니다

sentences.original_text: All the people of Judah and Jerusalem wept
